definition: to deal with the aftermath (arising from an accident)/funeral arrangements/reparations
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
reconstruction loan provided by Great Powers to Yuan Shikai in 1913

sentences.english: To work with pertinent institutions to prepare funerals for deceased retired cadres and take charge of cadres' posthumous affairs.
sentences.chinese: 會同有關部門辦理離退休幹部的喪葬和善後處理事宜。

sentences.english: Unclaimed bodies of the victims, such as rehabilitation work is under way.
sentences.chinese: 遇難者遺體認領等善後工作也正在展開。

sentences.english: The two sides will keep close contacts and cooperation to appropriately handle the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 雙方表示將就妥善處理善後事宜保持密切聯繫與合作。

sentences.english: Hygienic fight-flight reaction damage control processing.
sentences.chinese: 衛生應急反應的善後處理。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the works of rescue injured and rehabilitation dead people were done with all our strength.
sentences.chinese: 四是全力做好受傷人員搶救和遇難人員善後事宜。
目前相關善後工作正在進行。

sentences.english: BP is hiring local fishing boats to help in oil clean-up efforts.
sentences.chinese: 英國石油公司目前亦僱用了當地漁船幫忙處理善後。

sentences.english: This old gentleman is to deal with the aftermath of the traffic accident.
sentences.chinese: 這位老先生負責處理這次車禍的善後工作。

sentences.english: Also through reading your book I've learnt things they never tell you about aftercare in the Studio.
sentences.chinese: 書中還通過閱讀我學到的東西，沒告訴你善後的畫室。

sentences.english: Although, this takes place automatically, you must still carry out the aftercare recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 雖然，這需要自動進行，您仍然必須進行善後的建議。

sentences.english: Currently, relevant departments under way deal with the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 目前，有關部門正在進行善後處理。

sentences.english: In-centre treatment is followed by 12 months of statutory after-care supervision.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒犯獲釋後，尚須接受法定善後監管12個月。

sentences.english: Handling public crisis is an important link in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 公共危機善後處理是危機管理的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: This way, you will be in a much better place during the end game part of your release.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，在發行版的善後工作中，您會更加輕鬆。

sentences.english: Competent Chinese authorities attach great importance to searching and rescuing the crew members and handling the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 中方有關部門高度重視對遇險船員的搜救和善後工作。

definition: after the event/in hindsight/in retrospect
sometime/someday (in the future)
to evade/to shirk
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace

appropriate/proper/ready
as for/as to/to go so far as to
workplace overseer/foreman
to tidy up (dialect)
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
to deceive/to conceal
to arouse dislike/to incur hatred
party affairs/work within the Communist party
to decline/to avoid/shirking responsibilities/to blame others/to pass the buck/to unload one's responsibilities/to try to get out of a task
